entry.title: [RBX2][Dedicated Servers] - Rack 31B24/31B25
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Feb 14, 23:00 UTC  -  Feb 15, 06:00 UTC

Jan 14, 10:19 UTC
Update - New Start time : 14/02/2024 23:00 UTC
New End time : 15/02/2024 06:00 UTC

Jan 5, 03:50 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 14/02/2024 23:00 UTC
End time : 15/02/2024 06:00 UTC
Service impact : Each server in rack 31B24/31B25 will be unreachable for 30 minutes during the maintenance
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our infrastructure, our teams will move servers from rack 31B24/31B25 to racks 31A21/31B23.

entry.title: [RBX][Storage and Backups] - NAS HA maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Feb 14, 08:30 - 10:30 UTC

Feb 3, 04:25 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 14/02/2024 08:30 UTC
End time : 14/02/2024 10:30 UTC
Service impact : Impacted services might experience some input/output freezes for storage equipment during the maintenance.
Service improvement : AAs part of our NAS-HA hosting responsibilities, we will perform infrastructure maintenance.
The maintenance will update the storage servers that host your data.
This release will improve certain security mechanisms as well as some performance improvements.
Your data will remain available during the maintenance period.

entry.title: [SGP2][Virtual Private Server] - Servers
entry.content:
Feb 5, 15:19 UTC
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Feb 5, 14:58 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 05/02/2024 14:29 UTC
Service impact : All Virtual Private Servers are unreachable in SGP2
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be posted as significant progress is made.
